::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

As all the fire power was converged on Cyclonus, Rodimus realized that Cyclonus had agreed to the one on one battle and that the Sweeps had all stopped their assualt.

Rodimus raised his hand to get all the Maximals attention. He opened a comm on all Maximal and Autobot channels.

Rodimus Prime: The Minion forces are standing down. Cease fire immediately. Cyclonus and myself will remove ourselves from Atlantis. There is an island not to far away in which Cyclonus and I will battle one on one. They came for me and I will do this to protect the Maximal population of Atlantis. Rodimus out.

Rodimus looked at Cyclonus and pointed out at sea towards the island he was speaking of.

Rodimus: There. I will leave now on one of Atlantis' boats. You of course can fly there. Once we are gone have all the Minions leave Atlantis.

Rodimus swims over to one of the patrol boats and climbs aboard. He allows it's passengers to off load.

Kup swims over to the side.

Kup: Roddy, don't do this. Don't sacrifice yourself. We all would stand with you.

Rodimus: Just take care of Nightlight and Elita for me. Please.

Rodimus heads out towards the island on the small patrol boat.

::Lord Elder::

Elder listened in on the comm message and sighed. This was bad. Elder had Cyclonus laser targeted for air gun ships but that would be useless now. Elder knew that if Rodimus Prime lost this battle then the Minions would have exactly what the wanted. The Matrix.
